tool_description:
This API consumes documents in various formats and outputs PNG or TIFF images of the pages. Input is via a multipart POST.

Images of the pages can be retrieved individually using a session token. Options allow for specifying raster resolution and image quality.
name: Document Rasterizer - convert PDF PPT etc to images
title: Document Rasterizer - convert PDF PPT etc to images
tool_name: Document Rasterizer - convert PDF PPT etc to images

api_list.name: document metadata
api_list.description: Used to retrieve information about document length and endpoints. Same information as returned from POST.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The document ID returned from the POST

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mazira-rasterizer.p.rapidapi.com/11427-5723-srnpc9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mazira-rasterizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mazira-rasterizer.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mazira-rasterizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: rastered image
api_list.description: Used to generate an actual image of the specific page

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The document ID returned from POST

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The document page number to rasterize

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired image file format. Defaults to png24.

optional_parameters.name: res
optional_parameters.description: The rasterization resolution, in pixels-per-inch. For example, a PDF that is 8.5 inches wide, rasterized at 72 PPI, will produce an image 612 pixels wide. Default value is 72.

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description: An integer indicating the rasterization quality images, but longer processing time. Defaults to 1.
